text: Mandela Kapere (died 12 July 2020) was an Namibian politician. ==Biography== He was the member of the National Assembly of Namibia from 2020 to 2021. Kapere died from Covid-19 at age 38. ==References== Category:1980s births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Namibia Category:Namibian politicians
title: Mandela Kapere
